Name: Containment Corps
About the game: Containment Corps is an online multiplayer cooperative first person experience. The game combines elements of resource management and traditional FPS themes to create an exhilarating team-based encounter. You and a team of specialized units have been called upon to quell an uprising of contaminated swamp creatures. Choose your loadout and coordinate your defense; utilize unique abilities and powerful turrets to repel the onslaught. Keep the operation running. Manage your crystal energy supply to maintain full-base functionality, upgrade defenses, and power up weapons. Collect more by harvesting dead enemies. [Scaled Survival: Assemble a team to survive as long as possible. Play alone or with friends! Equip various items to give unique abilities or perks some of which include: Airstrike Landmine Stun trap Grenades Shotgun Automatic Turret Powershield And many more! Play in one of three maps Swamp Desert Canyon It will take a well organized and balanced team to resist the hordes How long can you survive?
